title: How to use the telephone
creator_credit: Public Relations Films, H M Treasury and Michael Law
brief_description: A training film made for use in Government (British) departments pointing out common mistakes in using the telephone and showing how a proper understanding of the relationship between caller, switchboard and extension-user can save a great deal of valuable time and energy.
